What is a good player for .mkv files?  DivX is what opened automatically, but apparently can't play the sound and I am having a hard time finding a player that will or a codec for it.

I found and downloaded VLC player immediately after posting that last comment which looks and sounds pretty good, though I'm glad I can actually hear it at all.  Other suggestions are appreciated still.  =)
Davhys, even windows media player plays .mkv files, otherwise vlc is probably the best video player in general, plus it plays almost every file type you can think of, so you shouyld be ok with vlc
another stupid mkv file.

It's 720p, so of course it is .mkv (matroska), a format that has been around since 2003.
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Matroska
VLC, MPC, and WMP all work fine, among many, many more.
